By GoldenBoy on Saturday, December 7, 2002 - 04:25 pm:

It has been posted on another board that if you
are raising a pixie, she will whisper a password
to Talt on one of her checkup visits. Has anyone
here had that happen yet? This is a post
Emperor's Cup thing, so don't panic if you've
never seen Talt at your ranch

that unlock like this?
